posts.translation: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

posts.title: 67:21 | Who will provide for you
posts.arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ
posts.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoor
posts.translation: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

posts.title: 67:30 | Who will provide you with water?
posts.arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ
posts.transliteration: Qul araaytum in asbaha maokum ghawran faman yateekum bimain maAAeen
posts.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

posts.title: 68:4 | The prophet embodies the best human ethics
posts.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٖ
posts.transliteration: Wainnaka laAAala khuluqin AAatheem
posts.translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

posts.title: 68:48 | Be patient
posts.arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ
posts.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi rabbika wala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nada wahuwa makthoom
posts.translation: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.

posts.title: 69:48 | Quran for the God-fearing people
posts.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذۡكِرَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
posts.transliteration: Wainnahu latathkiratun lilmuttaqeen
posts.translation: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

posts.title: 69:52 | Glorifying the names of Allah
posts.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
posts.transliteration: Fasabbih bismi rabbika alAAatheem
posts.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

posts.title: 70:4 | A day in the Hereafter
posts.arabic: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
posts.transliteration: TaAAruju almalaikatu warroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sana
posts.translation: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

posts.title: 70:19 | Human beings have been created anxious
posts.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
posts.transliteration: Inna alinsana khuliqa halooAAa
posts.translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

posts.title: 70:23 | Those who are constant in their prayers
posts.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ دَآئِمُونَ
posts.transliteration: Allatheena hum AAala salatihim daimoon
posts.translation: Those who are constant in their prayer

posts.title: 70:27 | Those who fear the punishment of Allah
posts.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
posts.transliteration: Wallatheena hum min AAathabi rabbihim mushfiqoon
posts.translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

posts.title: 70:32 | Those who keep their amanah (trusts) and ahd (convenants)
posts.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ رَٰعُونَ
posts.transliteration: Wallatheena hum liamanatihim waAAahdihim raAAoon
posts.translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

posts.title: 70:33 | Those who stand firm in their shahadah (testimonies)
posts.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَٰدَٰتِهِمۡ قَآئِمُونَ
posts.transliteration: Wallatheena hum bishahadatihim qaimoon
posts.translation: And those who are in their testimonies upright

posts.title: 71:10 | Seeking forgiveness
posts.arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
posts.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffara
posts.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

posts.title: 71:13 | Having regard for the gratefulness of Allah
posts.arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
posts.transliteration: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqara
posts.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

posts.title: 71:21 | 'My Lord! They have disobeyed me'
posts.arabic: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
posts.transliteration: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawnee wattabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasara
posts.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss."

posts.title: 72:18 | Mosques are for Allah
posts.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
posts.transliteration: Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahada
posts.translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

posts.title: 72:28 | Allah is aware of everything
posts.arabic: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
posts.transliteration: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin AAadada
posts.translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

posts.title: 73:10 | Face resistance with patience
posts.arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا
posts.transliteration: Wasbir AAala ma yaqooloona wahjurhum hajran jameela
posts.translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

posts.title: 74:54 | The Quran is a reminder
posts.arabic: كـَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةٞ
posts.transliteration: Kalla innahu tathkira
posts.translation: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

posts.title: 75:22 | Radiant faces
posts.arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاضِرَةٌ
posts.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin nadira
posts.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

posts.title: 75:36 | Everything has a purpose
posts.arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
posts.transliteration: Ayahsabu alinsanu an yutraka suda
posts.translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

posts.title: 76:3 | The two choices
posts.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
posts.transliteration: Inna hadaynahu assabeela imma shakiran waimma kafoora
posts.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

posts.title: 76:22 | Accepted endeavours
posts.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
posts.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaan wakana saAAyukum mashkoora
posts.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

posts.title: 76:30 | Allah's decree
posts.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
posts.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu inna Allaha kana AAaleeman hakeema
posts.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

posts.title: 77:7 | The promise
posts.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
posts.transliteration: Innama tooAAadoona lawaqiAA
posts.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

posts.title: 77:48 | Difficulty of submission
posts.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
posts.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahumu irkaAAoo la yarkaAAoon
posts.translation: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

posts.title: 78:29 | Everything is recorded
posts.arabic: وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ كِتَٰبٗا
posts.transliteration: Wakulla shayin ahsaynahu kitaba
posts.translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

posts.title: 78:36 | A generous gift
posts.arabic: جَزَآءٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابٗا
posts.transliteration: Jazaan min rabbika AAataan hisaba
posts.translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

posts.title: 79:24 | Allah the most High
posts.arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
posts.transliteration: Faqala ana rabbukumu alaAAla
posts.translation: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

posts.title: 79:46 | Perception of time in the Hereafter
posts.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
posts.transliteration: Kaannahum yawma yarawnaha lam yalbathoo illa AAashiyyatan aw duhaha
posts.translation: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

posts.title: 80:34 | A scene on the Day of Judgement
posts.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ
posts.transliteration: Yawma yafirru almaro min akheeh
posts.translation: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

posts.title: 81:14 | Accountability of actions
posts.arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
posts.transliteration: AAalimat nafsun ma ahdarat
posts.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

posts.title: 82:19 | The decision on that Day will be with Allah
posts.arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
posts.transliteration: Yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan walamru yawmaithin lillah
posts.translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

posts.title: 83:29 | Attitude of the disbelievers
posts.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
posts.transliteration: Inna allatheena ajramoo kanoo mina allatheena amanoo yadhakoon
posts.translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

posts.title: 83:34 | The last laugh
posts.arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
posts.transliteration: Falyawma allatheena amanoo mina alkuffari yadhakoon
posts.translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

posts.title: 84:8 | The one who recieves his record from his right hand
posts.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا
posts.transliteration: Fasawfa yuhasabu hisaban yaseera
posts.translation: He will be judged with an easy account

posts.title: 84:11 | The one who recieves his record from behind his back
posts.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا
posts.transliteration: Fasawfa yadAAoo thuboora
posts.translation: He will cry out for destruction

posts.title: 85:11 | Fate of the righteous
posts.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
posts.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo assalihati lahum jannatun tajree min tahtiha alanharu thalika alfawzu alkabeer
posts.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

posts.title: 85:14 | Attributes of Allah
posts.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
posts.transliteration: Wahuwa alghafooru alwadood
posts.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

posts.title: 85:16 | What He wills, happens
posts.arabic: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
posts.transliteration: FaAAAAalun lima yureed
posts.translation: Effecter of what He intends.

posts.title: 86:5 | Self-reflection
posts.arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
posts.transliteration: Falyanthuri alinsanu mimma khuliq
posts.translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

posts.title: 86:13 | The Quran is decisive
posts.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ
posts.transliteration: Innahu laqawlun fasl
posts.translation: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

posts.title: 87:1 | Glorify Allah
posts.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
posts.transliteration: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
posts.translation: Sabbihi isma rabbika alaAAla

posts.title: 88:21 | Your role is to remind
posts.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ
posts.transliteration: Fathakkir innama anta muthakkir
posts.translation: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

posts.title: 88:22 | You can't control people
posts.arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
posts.transliteration: Lasta AAalayhim bimusaytir
posts.translation: You are not over them a controller.

posts.title: 89:20 | Our relationship with wealth
posts.arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا
posts.transliteration: Watuhibboona almala hubban jamma
posts.translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

posts.title: 90:8 | Signs in ourselves
posts.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ
posts.transliteration: Alam najAAal lahu AAaynayn
posts.translation: Have We not made for him two eyes?

posts.title: 90:17 | Patience and mercy
posts.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
posts.transliteration: Thumma kana mina allatheena amanoo watawasaw bissabri watawasaw bilmarhama
posts.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

posts.title: 91:13 | Animal rights
posts.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
posts.transliteration: Faqala lahum rasoolu Allahi naqata Allahi wasuqyaha
posts.translation: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

posts.title: 92:5 | Fearing Allah and giving charity
posts.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
posts.transliteration: Faamma man aAAta wattaqa
posts.translation: As for he who gives and fears Allah

posts.title: 93:3 | Allah Is With You
posts.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَ
posts.transliteration: Ma waddaAAaka rabbuka wama qala
posts.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

posts.title: 93:7 | Divine Guidance
posts.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ
posts.transliteration: Wawajadaka dallan fahada
posts.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],

posts.title: 94:5 | With hardship comes ease
posts.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا
posts.transliteration: Fainna maAAa alAAusri yusra
posts.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

posts.title: 95:8 | Allah as the most Just
posts.arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
posts.transliteration: Alaysa Allahu biahkami alhakimeen
posts.translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

posts.title: 96:19 | Draw close to Allah
posts.arabic: كـَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب
posts.transliteration: Kalla la tutiAAhu wasjud waqtarib
posts.translation: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

posts.title: 97:1 | The Night in which the Quran was revealed
posts.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
posts.transliteration: Inna anzalnahu fee laylati alqadr
posts.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

posts.title: 97:3 | The unmatched value of Laylatul Qadr
posts.arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
posts.transliteration: Laylatu alqadri khayrun min alfi shahr
posts.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

posts.title: 98:7 | The best of creation
posts.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
posts.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo assalihati olaika hum khayru albariyya
posts.translation: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

posts.title: 98:8 | Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him
posts.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
posts.transliteration: Jazaohum AAinda rabbihim jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan radiya Allahu AAanhum waradoo AAanhu thalika liman khashiya rabbah
posts.translation: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

posts.title: 99:7 | Even the smallest good will be seen
posts.arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
posts.transliteration: Faman yaAAmal mithqala tharratin khayran yarah
posts.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

posts.title: 98:8 | No evil deed goes unnoticed
posts.arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
posts.transliteration: Waman yaAAmal mithqala tharratin sharran yarah
posts.translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

posts.title: 100:11 | All will be revealed
posts.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ
posts.transliteration: Inna rabbahum bihim yawmaithin lakhabeer
posts.translation: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

posts.title: 101:6 | A rewarding life for those with heavy scales of good deeds
posts.arabic: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ
posts.transliteration: Fahuwa fee AAeeshatin radiya
posts.translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

posts.title: 102:8 | Accountability
posts.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
posts.transliteration: Thumma latusalunna yawmaithin AAani annaAAeem
posts.translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

posts.title: 103:2 | Mankind is in loss
posts.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ
posts.transliteration: Inna alinsana lafee khusr
posts.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

posts.title: 103:3 | Except for those who embody four qualities
posts.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
posts.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo assalihati watawasaw bilhaqqi watawasaw bissabr
posts.translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

posts.title: 104:3 | People's perception of wealth
posts.arabic: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ
posts.transliteration: Yahsabu anna malahu akhladah
posts.translation: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

posts.title: 105:2 | The defeat of the Army of the Elephant
posts.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ
posts.transliteration: Alam yajAAal kaydahum fee tadleel
posts.translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

posts.title: 106:3 | Lord of the Ka'bah
posts.arabic: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ
posts.transliteration: FalyaAAbudoo rabba hatha albayt
posts.translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

posts.title: 106:4 | Economic stability and security
posts.arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
posts.transliteration: Allathee atAAamahum min jooAAin waamanahum min khawf
posts.translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

posts.title: 107:5 | Warning for those careless in prayer
posts.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
posts.transliteration: Allatheena hum AAan salatihim sahoon
posts.translation: [But] who are heedless of their prayer

posts.title: 108:2 | Prayer and sacrifice
posts.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ
posts.transliteration: Fasalli lirabbika wanhar
posts.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

posts.title: 109:6 | Co-existence of religions
posts.arabic: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ
posts.transliteration: Lakum deenukum waliya deen
posts.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion.

posts.title: 110:1 | Victory of Allah
posts.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ
posts.transliteration: Itha jaa nasru Allahi walfath
posts.translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

posts.title: 110:3 | Glorification and seeking forgiveness
posts.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
posts.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirhu innahu kana tawwaba
posts.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

posts.title: 111:1 | Abu Lahab is doomed
posts.arabic: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ
posts.transliteration: Tabbat yada abee lahabin watab
posts.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

posts.title: 112:1 | The Oneness of Allah
posts.arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
posts.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad
posts.translation: Say, He is Allah, [who is] One

posts.title: 113:2 | Evil within creation
posts.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
posts.transliteration: Min sharri ma khalaq
posts.translation: From the evil of that which He created

posts.title: 113:5 | Evil of the envier
posts.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
posts.transliteration: Wamin sharri hasidin itha hasad
posts.translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies.

posts.title: 114:5 | The one who whispers evil into people's hearts
posts.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
posts.transliteration: Allathee yuwaswisu fee sudoori annas
posts.translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind
